title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 18 - Taking Bait
content:

State Regulations
§ 18.0 - Definition
§ 18.1 - Possession and use of minnow nets and traps for personal use
§ 18.2 - Taking bait fish for sale as bait
§ 18.3 - Taking aquatic insects for bait
§ 18.4 - Repealed
§ 18.5 - Repealed

Notes

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 11-0303, 11-0305, 11-0306, 11-0315, 11-0317, 11-0319, 11-0325, 11-1301, 11-1303, 11-1305, 11-1315, 11-1316, 11-1319, 11-1501, 11-1503, 11-1505, 11-2101, 13-0105, 13- 0339

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
